title.native: アンティケール・メモワール～曰く憑き取扱骨董品店～

description:
The main character, Ritsuka Amamiya, has the power of psychometry, which allows him to see the past just by touching people and objects. An antique fantasy tale about the past!

(Source: Square-Enix)

tags.name: Time Manipulation
tags.description: Prominently features time-traveling or other time-warping phenomena.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

node.description:
Matsuki is a Japanese author and manga artist working with the editor KUROKAWA.

Matsuki is best known for being the author & artist of [Durarara!! Comic Anthology: Duralove!!](https://anilist.co/manga/51587/Durarara-Comic-Anthology-Duralove/) (volume 2), [Touken Ranbu Online Anthology: SQEX Formation](https://anilist.co/manga/98555/Touken-Ranbu-Online-Anthology-SQEX-no-Jin/), [Antique Memoir: Iwakutsuki Toriatsukai Kottouhin-ten](https://anilist.co/manga/115495/Antique-Memoir-Iwakutsuki-Toriatsukai-Kottouhinten/) and [I wanted to play in another world because I received the castle in the sky](https://anilist.co/manga/110075/Tenkuu-no-Shiro-wo-Moratta-no-de-Isekai-de-Tanoshiku-Asobitai/).
She is now working on [She Was Picked Up By A Ruthless Duke Because She Became Younger Due To Medicine](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_001868_S?episodeType=first)'s character design and art *(not added yet to AniList database)*.

Since the 22th February, 2024, she's working on [Overlord: New World](https://anilist.co/manga/177534/Overlord-Shin-Sekaihen/) where she was brought on to replace [Fugin Miyama](https://anilist.co/staff/117165/Fugin-Miyama) who left the Overlord team on the 25th of May, 2023.

>*__Favourite animal:__* Cat.
*__Favourite series:__* Grandblue Fantasy, Harry Potter.
*__Software used sor illustrations:__* Clip Studio Paint EX.
*__First recorded work:__* 2014-08-08.

---

**Social media:**

- __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/matsuki01025/) (Personnal)__ - Doujin, hobbies, fanarts & doodles, cooking and cats.
- __[Twitter ](https://twitter.com/matsuki0001025/) (Professional)__ - Release annoncements.
- __[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/matsuki000/)__ - Hobbies, fanarts & doodles, cooking and cats.
- __[Threads](https://www.threads.net/@matsuki000)__ - Hobbies.
- __[Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/4334553/)__ - Artworks, fanarts, manga.
- __[ポイピク (Poikipu)](https://poipiku.com/47090/)__ - R18 artworks.
- __[くるっぷ (Crepu)](https://crepu.net/user/matsuki/)__ - Practice art.
- __[ついふぁん！(Tsuifan)](https://twfan.net/user/3074873178/new/1)__ - Artwork, R18 artworks and hobbies (since 2015-02-12).
- __[TwoCan](https://twoucan.com/profile/matsuki0001025)__ - Artworks and R18 artworks (since 2019-03-26).
- __[Tumblr](https://matsuki-tou.tumblr.com/) (Inactive)__ - Artworks, hobbies (2014-08-08 to 2019-01-18), migrated to Instagram.
- __[Pawoo](https://pawoo.net/@matsuki_tou/) (Inactive)__ - Release annoncements (2017-07-02 to 2019-09-19).
- __[Foriio](https://www.foriio.com/Matsuki000/) (Inactive)__ - Portfolio.
- __[Fantia](https://fantia.jp/fanclubs/1258/) (Inactive)__ - Artworks, migrated to Pixiv.
